overview: Richard DeMilt was formerly worldwide Controller of Ogilvy & Mather, with $2 billion in annual revenue. Over his 20-year career at Ogilvy, Rich implemented a worldwide consolidation and reporting system, client-level accounting, time and reporting systems, and automation of all financial reporting. Rich has deep agency experience in analyzing acquisitions, strategic planning, and forecasting and budgeting. Prior to Ogilvy, Rich worked for the public accounting firm Touche Ross & Co. Rich lives in Cranbury, New Jersey, with his wife Mary and three children.
